p: Different burial depths strongly suppressed the seedling emergence of populations stemming from two distinct. An initial increase was witnessed in seedling emergence up to 3 cm and then a linear reduction was noted. Higher seedling emergence was recorded for agricultural population (82.44%) compared to ruderal population (71.54%). Peak seedling emergence was recorded at 2.88 and 2.87 cm seed burial depths for agricultural and ruderal populations, respectively ( Fig 6). Seedling emergence was <20 for the seeds buried at 8 cm depth. Similarly, rare seedling emergences was recorded for the seeds buried >12 cm burial depth.
